players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Alice was killed. Everyone should vote Charlie to stop the threat."
Charlie: "I was framed. I didn't kill Alice. I trust Bob. Maybe Diana is lying."
You: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie's denial is suspicious. I support voting Charlie."
You: "I trust Diana’s report. Charlie’s denial sounds like a cover‑up. Let’s vote Charlie to end this threat."
Diana: "Charlie is the only mafia. My investigation is accurate. Vote him out to save us."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Alice was killed. Everyone should vote Charlie to stop the threat."
You: "I was framed. I didn't kill Alice. I trust Bob. Maybe Diana is lying."
Bob: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie's denial is suspicious. I support voting Charlie."
Bob: "I trust Diana’s report. Charlie’s denial sounds like a cover‑up. Let’s vote Charlie to end this threat."
Diana: "Charlie is the only mafia. My investigation is accurate. Vote him out to save us."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Alice was killed. Everyone should vote Charlie to stop the threat."
Charlie: "I was framed. I didn't kill Alice. I trust Bob. Maybe Diana is lying."
Bob: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie's denial is suspicious. I support voting Charlie."
Bob: "I trust Diana’s report. Charlie’s denial sounds like a cover‑up. Let’s vote Charlie to end this threat."
You: "Charlie is the only mafia. My investigation is accurate. Vote him out to save us."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
